title: AI tool finds cancer signs missed by doctors
description:
An AI tool has proven capable of detecting signs of cancer that were overlooked by human radiologists. The AI tool, called Mia, was piloted alongside NHS clinicians in the UK and analysed the mammograms of over 10,000 women.  Most of the participants were cancer-free, but the AI successfully flagged all of those with symptoms of... Read more »

The post AI tool finds cancer signs missed by doctors appeared first on AI News.
